Title: Series: Royal-Size Bible
Series: Historiae Sacrae Veteris et Novi Testamenti
Series: Biblische figuren, Darinnen die fürnembste historien, in heiliger Schrifft begriffen, geschichtmässig entworffen
Series: Figures de la Bible, demonstrans les principales histoires de la Saincte Escriture
Series: Bybelsche figuren, vertonende de voornaemste historien der Heylige Schrifture
Series: Figures of the Bible, in wich almost every history of the Holy Scriptures is discribed
Description: The Flight into Egypt; Joseph leading a donkey carrying Virgin Mary and Jesus Christ at right, several putti leading an ox at left; after Jacob Jordaens; from a series of 130 engravings (plus title-page) forming a Picture Bible Engraving
Curator's comments: For comment on the volume see 1939,0130.1.1.
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (undescribed) (Visscher; after Jacob Jordaens)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Charles Bruce, 3rd Viscount of Ampthill (1712)
Acquisition notes: The ex-libris of Charles Bruce (dated 1712) is pasted on the verso of the title-page (1939,0130.1.1)
